'''0.2.5_01''' was a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on November 25, 2010, which fixes respawning bugs.<ref>{{link |url=https://notch.tumblr.com/post/1681247283/bug-update-1-more-coming-tomorrow |date=November 25, 2010 |website= The Word of Notch |title=Bug update #1. More coming tomorrow}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several bugs regarding player respawning in multiplayer, including a ghosting bug.
